tasks.label: unload driver
tasks.command: if [ -e /sys/bus/i2c/drivers/tasdevice-codec ] && [ -e /sys/bus/i2c/drivers/tasdevice-codec/1-002e ]; then echo '1-002e' | sudo tee /sys/bus/i2c/drivers/tasdevice-codec/unbind ; fi; if [ -e /sys/bus/i2c/drivers/tasdevice-codec ] && [ -e /sys/bus/i2c/drivers/tasdevice-codec/1-002f ]; then echo '1-002f' | sudo tee /sys/bus/i2c/drivers/tasdevice-codec/unbind ; fi; sudo rmmod snd_soc_tasdevice; sudo rmmod snd_soc_simple_card;

tasks.label: load driver
tasks.command: sudo insmod snd_soc_tasdevice.ko && sudo modprobe snd_soc_simple_card
